meanings.definition: The quality or state of being slinky.
meanings.sent1: Her slinkiness caught everyone's attention at the party.
meanings.sent2: The cat's slinkiness made it an excellent hunter.
meanings.sent3: The slinkiness of the dancer's movements was mesmerizing to watch.
meanings.sent4: The slinkiness of the fabric made the dress look elegant and graceful.
meanings.sent5: The slinkiness of the snake as it slithered across the ground was both fascinating and eerie.

meanings.definition: The characteristic of moving in a smooth and sinuous manner.
meanings.sent1: The slinkiness of the river as it flowed through the valley was calming to watch.
meanings.sent2: The gymnast's routine was filled with slinkiness and grace.
meanings.sent3: The slinkiness of the ribbon as it fluttered in the wind was a sight to behold.
meanings.sent4: The slinkiness of the car on the winding road made the drive enjoyable.
meanings.sent5: The slinkiness of the dancer's movements on stage captivated the audience.
